dcterms:description: The ISLES 2017 dataset encompasses 75 ischaemic stroke patients, separated into training (n = 43) and testing (n = 32) sets. Each patient is characterized by six 3D parametric MRI maps: diffusion ADC map, perfusion rCBF, rCBV, TTP, MTT, and Tmax maps, along with a manual delineation of the lesion at a 90-day follow-up.
dcterms:title: ISLES 2017

dcterms:description: A private dataset consisting of 23 acute ischaemic stroke patients acquired at Bern University Hospital in Switzerland, characterized by the same six parametric maps as ISLES 2017, with the final lesion manually delineated at a 90-day follow-up.
dcterms:title: Private dataset
